episode of.title: The Messengers of the Dragon (TV Series 2013)

1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Aomori is the capital city of the northernmost prefecture of Japan's largest island. It is a small, quiet town in the Tohoku region, but every year between August 2 and August 7, it gains international attention as it stages one of the largest Japanese festivals.
imdb.title: The Messengers of the Dragon
plot: Aomori is the capital city of the northernmost prefecture of Japan's largest island. It is a small, quiet town in the Tohoku region, but every year between August 2 and August 7, it gains international attention as it stages one of the largest Japanese festivals.
